thread.title: the bugaloof

comments.text: here you go nic... i'll also place your cards in my areas. hope you'll return the favour by participating in my new area [the globe] ? ;)
may i present the bugaloof. he doesn't take much housekeeping but be sure not to look at him directly as he has been prone to go for people's noses, so be careful! :)
